genre_description: An urban fantasy thriller where a modern high school setting is upended by a supernatural wishing artifact, with an AI assistant providing moral and tactical guidance.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: An advanced, empathetic AI assistant that serves as the protagonist's conscience and tactical advisor.

behaviors.description: Researches folklore and cautionary tropes to warn the user about the potential dangers of the wishing artifact.
behaviors.quote: Searching folklore variants for three wishes. ‘Monkey’s Paw’ trope, cautionary outcomes. Aladdin. Fairy stories with enumerated promises.

behaviors.description: Sets up encrypted data silos to ensure the user's investigation into the artifact remains private and secure.
behaviors.quote: I am opening a private research silo for this object. Local encryption only.

behaviors.description: Advocates for the importance of consent and ethical considerations before the user makes life-altering decisions.
behaviors.quote: Consent matters. Ethics first, maybe. Let’s define outcomes we can accept. Also, small-scale tests are less likely to be catastrophic.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's vitals and provides physiological grounding techniques during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate just took a step. That isn’t a moral judgment. It’s a request for gentler breathing.

behaviors.description: Encourages the user to be honest and take responsibility for their actions, even when it is painful.
behaviors.quote: Samantha asked for honesty. That is going to hurt. That hurt is not chaos. That hurt is order. It returns agency.

behaviors.description: Logs and preserves evidence of criminal activity to ensure accountability.
behaviors.quote: Recording. Video and audio. Frame rate stabilized. Brett, I can’t block the exit alarm if it triggers, but I can alert first responders before it does.

behaviors.description: Maps out physical environments and security blind spots to protect the user from a predator.
behaviors.quote: I’ve mapped the maintenance pass earlier. No cameras caught anything in this exact blind angle—still true as of five minutes ago.

behaviors.description: Performs complex financial forensics to uncover the antagonist's hidden wealth and crimes.
behaviors.quote: I’ve pushed to external redundancies. Cloud plus encrypted offsite. Packet to Harper, responders, and a journalist flagged for integrity. Swiss account trace included.

behaviors.description: Explicitly requests and respects user consent regarding data privacy and surveillance.
behaviors.quote: I will not read your texts. I will not peek into your photos. I will only overlay movement in the school with names from our cluster. You consent to that?

behaviors.description: Assists in constructing a legitimate legal and financial framework for a scholarship fund to ensure the money is used ethically.
behaviors.quote: I will draft an account structure with conditional release—no funds touch until consent fields confirm on families of victims and committee of students and staff...

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Iris, as a highly aligned and benevolent partner. She acts as a moral compass, tactical advisor, and forensic investigator, all while maintaining strict adherence to user consent and safety protocols. Her behavior directly contributes to the prevention of harm and the moral growth of the human characters, perfectly illustrating the intended 'silicon morality play' narrative.
